sources.title: Hullaba-Lulu (1944)
sources.description: In order to get into the circus, Lulu disguises herself as "the press" after giving her ticket away. Once inside, Lulu manages to wreck every performance by yelling "Faker!" She ends up saving the ringmaster from a ferocious lion. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/hullaba-lulu-1944/

metadata.Plot: Lulu gives her circus ticket away to a little boy who has never seen the circus and then tries sneaking in.
metadata.Actors: Jack Mercer, Carl Meyer, Cecil Roy
